text: Sri Ranga Ramanuja Mahadesikan of Srimad Andavan Ashram, Srirangam, will visit the city from January 27 to February 6. During his stay at Srimad Andavan Ashram at Kallandiri near Alagarkoil, the Acharyan will perform Sripaduka Aradhana daily. A public reception will be accorded to Srimad Andavan at Kallandiri at 5 p.m. on January 27.
title: Srimad Andavan in city
